The transcription factor NF-kappa B controls the induction of numerous cytokine promoters during the activation of T lymphocytes .

Inhibition of T cell activation by the immunosuppressants cyclosporin A ( CsA ) and FK506 exerts a suppressive effect on the induction of these NF-kappa B - controlled cytokine promoters .
